properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Storm Warning issued January 14 at 2:39PM PST until January 15 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts to 30 kt, becoming
south tonight and increasing to 35 to 45 kt with gusts to 60 kt
Wednesday morning. Seas 12 to 13 feet at 13 seconds building to
17 to 22 feet at 13 seconds Wednesday.

* WHERE...Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Storm Warning, from 5 AM to 3 PM PST Wednesday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 5 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Very strong winds will cause hazardous seas which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should remain in port, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 3 PM PST WEDNESDAY
